website_summaries.verdict: Sleek Samsung smartwatch featuring heart-rate tracking, a built-in GPS and enables Samsung Pay. Overall well built.
pros: Great smartwatch for all-day fitness tracking, notifications and  mobile payments
Onboard GPS and the ability to load and play music with a connected Bluetooth headset will appeal to runners
cons: Response to notifications is limited to the most recent messages

customer_reviews.title: The rest is good
customer_reviews.text: Be careful, samsung pay doesn't work on the international version of the watch
customer_reviews.author: Member of the account

customer_reviews.title: Good smart watch but the battery life sucks at the moment
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch and my only complaint is the battery life but that is easily fixed with an update. Though I guess charging was an issue for a day or two since it gets hot when its charging, so put a fan next to it and it should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A SCAM
customer_reviews.text: This was a scam. I received a Casio G-Shock instead. All the accessories were gone.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cant leave home without it! Its life for any fitness enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The only drawback so far is that I have not been able to install the Spotify app, but I'm guessing that is something I will be able to get around to sooner or later
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Fabbro

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t mix well with iPhone
customer_reviews.text: If you have a iPhone get a series 3 instead
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: happy.. i wear allready 3 month with extreme activity... still work fine
customer_reviews.author: August Yummi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Little wonky at first, but some easy fixes and some updates later, its all good! I use this daily for all sorts of tracking and additional time management functions, pun intended!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Really nice....
customer_reviews.text: the ONLY thing i think i dont like about it thus far is that the body's material holds fingerprints and the original band it comes with is a bit lacking in quality. bands are easy to get tho so that is not a really big issue. so far, had it for a few days and cannot complain.
customer_reviews.author: K D. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch just didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Was a great watch while it lasted but recently just quit working and won't turn on at all. I do enjoy the device and probably will get another if I can't get mine repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My watch is in great condition. Great work and thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Avritte

customer_reviews.title: I am havin problems with watch staying connected to my ...
customer_reviews.text: I am havin problems with watch staying connected to my phone. Also 3 time the watch had stop changing saying it is over heating
customer_reviews.author: Shelia Jones

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this watch but after less than six months it died.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch ,it's so lovely it feels great when you wear it, to be more excited about it you have to be an active person ,I've tested the GPS accuracy and it seems it's decent and reports the correct speed and distance ,I wish if Samsung allow Nike app to be installed on this watch ,the Samsung is not bad at all I'm using it for all fitness matters The watch is easy to use easy to charge I have no issues with the battery 👍
customer_reviews.author: Smart buyer

product_meta.title: Samsung Gear Sport (SM-R600) Black, International Version, No Warranty
product_meta.description: Get motivated to move more, eat better, and live a healthy life. The Gear Sport tracks your fitness and diet, keeping you on the right path to reach your goals. It’s as stylish as it is functional. Change the look of your Gear Sport with a range of straps and watch faces. Whether it’s the sporty Hybrid Sport, timeless Classic Leather, or the casual cool Premium Nato, there’s a style to go with your look. Set health and diet goals on your phone and start tracking your progress right from your wrist: Gear Sport makes it easy to keep your calories in balance and track calorie intake. It also offers tips and insights that you can use to stay on track.
feature_bullets: 1.2inch Super AMOLED Capacitive Touchscreen w/ Corning Gorilla Glass 3
Tizen-Based Wearable Platform 3.0, Exynos 3250 Dual Chipset, Dual-Core 1.0 GHz Processor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars119 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
